entry.title: kenjiakira/Vue-Tiktok: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.
entry.content: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.

entry.title: C-Teo/minerva: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
entry.content: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
